product_name: Custom Correct Mt. Olympus Climber'sTopo Map
long_description: This map depicts climbing routes as described in the Climber's Guide to the Olympic Mountains by Olympic Mountain Rescue. Please consult Climber's Guide for complete descriptions of these routes and for other detailed information about climbing routes. All climbing routes depicted are rated Grade II, Class 3, however glacial recession and seasonal conditions may increase the hazard or difficulty. Local inquiry is recommended. Map compiled in 1986 from USGS; 1:62,500 scale base maps; trails, selected roads and distances measured and re-mapped 1984 -95. Roads and woodland shading revised from photos and maps dated 1990-1994. 100-foot contours are interpolated on Kloochman Rock portion of map. Little River Enterprises; copyright 1986 - 2001.
short_description: This map depicts climbing routes as described in the Climber's Guide to the Olympic Mountains by Olympic Mountain Rescue.
